entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ApartmentStateTest_ChangeBeforeThreadStarted failing #72232
  • Clear Background flag when thread is stopped #72231
  • System.Net.Security.Tests failed on arm32v7 #72227
  • SslStreamCertificateContext has public fields in its implementation that aren't in the contract #72226
    8.0.0
  • HostingAbstractionsHostExtensions RunAsync disposes without logging #72225
  • Please revert PR #57561 #72220
  • System.Net.Http.Function.Tests and System.Net.Websockets.Client.Tests work items failing on runtime-extra-platforms Mono_Release runs #72209
  • `[U]Int128` alignment handling on Unix x64 is in the wrong place #72206
  • Null dereferencing makes AccessViolationException under certain condition. #72202
    8.0.0
  • [Quic] System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.WriteTests timeout in rolling build #72196
    7.0.0
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 with WSL1 #72192
  • [API Proposal]: AesGcm/AesCcm.KeyByteSizes, AesGcm/AesCcm.KeySize #72191
  • [Question] CoreCLR debug API usage, evaluation after `ICorDebugController::Stop`. #72190
  • System.Text.Json instances of polymorphic types emit type discriminator when serialized as `object` types #72187
    7.0.0
  • Request with HttpVersion > 3 and RequestVersionOrHigher policy sent as H/3 request #72185
    7.0.0
  • "coreclr Pri0 Runtime Tests Run windows arm64 check" timeouts #72182
  • Crash in GetHashCode with generic record #72181
  • HttpClient The response ended prematurely #72177
    Future
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException thrown when using System.Text.Json in mixed .Net version solution. Assembly versions do not match. #72173
  • System.Text.Json metadata writer does not check for property name conflicts #72170
    7.0.0
  • SaveWmfAsPngDoesntChangeImageBoundaries test failure with NativeAOT #72165
  • QUIC: DefaultStreamErrorCode and DefaultCloseErrorCode default values cause error #72160
    7.0.0
  • matrix4x4createfromaxisangletest failing on NativeAOT #72149

Closed

  • HttpStress is not running on Windows in CI #72096
    7.0.0
  • cmake error when trying to generate solution for corehost. #72156
  • TrimOOBAssemblies target shouldn't hardcode untrimmable assemblies #72166
  • [NativeAOT] llvm-objcopy is missing in default build pre-requisities #72155
  • How about use IReadonly with Options pattern #69851
  • usersecrets are not accessible inside container for worker service project #36062
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json contract customization: stack overflow when adding recursive properties via JsonMetadataServices #72175
    7.0.0
  • Allow replacing IExternalScopeProvider via DI #50590
    7.0.0
  • profiler unit test releaseondetach SIGABRT'ing with updated C# compiler / `!!` usage #64986
    7.0.0
  • Enum.GetUnderlyingType crashes the runtime on generic arguments constrained as Enums #71884
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws an exception when struct implements the default constructor #72200
  • Installer test failed on osx_x64 - `.NativeHostApis.Breadcrumb_thread_does_not_finish_when_app_has_unhandled_exception` #57243
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Exposing HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 protocol error codes #70684
    7.0.0
  • Init block morphing is not general enough #70898
    8.0.0
  • .NET Core 3.1 RSA decryption with 3k certificates failed on Linux environments due to OAEP padding #71607
    Future
  • Lots of NegotiateStream tests failing locally on Win11 #72152
    7.0.0
  • [Host] Failed to get pointer of a function, statusCode: 0x80070057 #72195
  • Remove UnmanagedCallersOnly_MonoAotTest from runtime tests #71532
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'ins != INS_invalid' #72158
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Enable UnmanagedCallersOnlyTest tests for the supported features in Mono AOT #71537
  • Reconsider the semantics of `JsonProperty.ShouldSerialize` null values #71964
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider DI overloads to use implementation factory with open generic types #72163
  • Possible regression: ConfigurationBinder cannot bind private properties of base classes #71040
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'sizeBytes != 0' #72081
    7.0.0
  • Expose ClientWebSocket Upgrade Response Headers #28331
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: WebSocketException to expose the underlying HTTPResponse or the response status #62474
    7.0.0
  • [runtime-coreclr pgo] nativeruntimeeventsource test fails arm32 and x86 #71331
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\runtimeeventsource\\nativeruntimeeventsource\\nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd #70966
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #68690
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Error when creating QuicConnection - An internal error has occured. Status code: QUIC_STATUS_USER_CANCELED #72161
  • [QUIC] Stream refactorings #59346
    Future
  • QUIC: Should not need finalization on MsQuicStream/Connection/Listener #55103
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][firefox] Add exception handling in evaluateJSAsync #70819
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not run with the .NET 5 SDK #61243
    7.0.0
  • dotnet --info reports duplicates of paths #59833
    6.0.x
  • [Question] Type.GetTypeCode And Half Type #72123
  • Calls to comctl32.dll succeed in .NET 4.8, but fail in .NET 5 with System.EntryPointNotFoundException #46720
    7.0.0
  • Host should inform user about other installed archs on the system #51101
    7.0.0
  • Math.BigMul(ulong a, ulong b, out ulong low) uses SoftwareFallback even though Bmi2.X64.IsSupported. #71816
  • corerun with DOTNET_EnableEventLog: "Heap contamination detected! "HeapFree was called on a heap other than the one that memory was allocated from." #56888
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests - add NumericOperators to rd.xml #69943
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests.Expression_Tests.TestCallStaticMethodsByName - add rd.xml #69928
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Investigate esoteric failures in System.Linq.Expression.Tests #69944
    7.0.0
  • Cannot debug on CentOS Stream 9 from Visual Studio 2022 (Kernel 5.14) #67818
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update UserTypeMarshallingV2.md to match approved design #72230
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove fallback to reflection converter resolution #72228
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Repro test failure #72224
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.0
  • Tweak SafeHandle finalization logging to include a count #72223
  • Fix chain cleanup in SslStream.SelectClientCertificate #72222
  • Fix most SafeHandle finalization occurrence in System.Net.Quic #72221
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    6.0.x
  • Double (and Float) to Decimal Conversion Precision Improvement #72217
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use a stackalloc for short SHA1 hashes in X509SubjectKeyIdentifierExtension #72216
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] + js interop ownership #72215
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [RateLimiting] Rename resourceID in PartitionedRateLimiter #72214
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72213
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove Mono LLVM tools from Darc subscription #72212
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use correct runtime assembly in MetadataReader tests #72211
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.0
  • Support guaranteed unmarshal for stateless collection marshalling #72205
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fixes for NonBacktracking NFA mode #72199
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Fix some SafeHandle finalization in System.Net.Security #72189
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Link ignored test back to filed issue #72188
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add interop code to the browser template #72172
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enabling 9 new libraries tests for NativeAOT #72167
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Remove an assert from impHWIntrinsic #72084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vector.Shuffle should use SSE2 for double overload when AVX is not availablee #72168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove hardcoded non trimmable assemblies in oob.proj #72171
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove IsPreRelease msbuild property #72169
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make llvm-objcopy preferred; no required #72208
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix tar checksum calculation bug #72139
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/3 #72210
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use open images in HTTP/SSL pools #72218
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Allow marshaller entry-point type to be a struct #72207
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 in a few more places #71992
    area-Meta
  • Fix more success path finalization in System.Security.Cryptography #72203
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-preview7] [wasm] JSImport feedback #72201
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix a broken dprintf #72198
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix stackoverflow issue when creating recursive contracts using JsonIgnoreCondition #72186
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable releaseondetach profiler test #72144
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor segment size computation #71178
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix error handling for generic arguments constrained as Enums #72141
    area-System.Reflection
  • Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/3 #72095
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect buffer reallocation in AcceptSecurityContext #72184
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] JSImport feedback #72174
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #72142
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Utilize new APIs more in System.Formats.Asn1 #72055
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • [mono] Refactor UnmanagedCallersOnly_MonoAot tests #71535
    area-Interop-mono
  • Don't explicitly link ICU into Mono on FreeBSD #70088
    area-Build-mono
  • Add missing inlining attribute (System.Numerics.Vector3) #72058
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder should support binding private properties from ba… #71039
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Get rid of hardcoded sleep in tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #72010
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix WritePGOData #72083
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger][firefox] Added exception handling for Firefox onEval #72011
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Support caller-allocated buffer for stateless collection marshalling #72122
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Avoid making the 'this' variable volatile. #71799
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Speed up ThreadLocalStatics_Test in DEBUG builds #72151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Add support for building WASM variants alongside single-threaded to the build system #72130
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Use `-unicode` instead of `/unicode` for linux ildasm roundtrip tests #71958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix more SafeHandle cleanup in Windows crypto PAL #72116
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Tar stream seeking, flushing, and argument validation #72045
    area-System.IO
  • Fix all outstanding S.Linq.Expressions failures #72077
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mix newer kernel versions into library test matrix #71740
    area-Meta
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Testing out `required` keyword #72233
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 6 SDK #72145
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Utilize ProtocolException for HTTP/2 in HttpStress #72034
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Simplify AppModel addToProject settings #72072
    area-Meta
  • Add diagnostic suppressor for the MarkMethodsAsStatic diagnostics on custom marshallers #72129
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] Add `perf-wasm` pipeline #72119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Pass the pending exception correctly from interp_runtime_invok… #72126
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix `ldelem[a]/stelem/cpobj/ldobj/stobj <pointer type>` import #71679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [LoongArch64] add crossgen2 for LoongArch64. #72017
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Annotating libraries with small number of warnings to be AOT safe #72108
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui runs for net7.0 #71979
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem outputting an incorrect remainder #72115
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove GTF_CALL_M_UNMGD_THISCALL and badcode on thiscall with 0 args #71882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Log as error in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • [fxr] Use std::find_if when searching for root framework. #72080
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • #60582 enable ExtractToDirectoryExtension_Unicode on ios/tvos #72091
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Do not consider single-reg bitcasts multi-reg nodes #72020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Port getifaddrs implementation from Xamarin.Android #72097
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed duplicated testcases as a follow-up for #70560 #71827
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Properly calculate the ELF unwind info section size #72146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • perf fixes for high memory load situation #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
